description: JSON Schema used to store information about a floor, including its floor plan, areas and data

id.description: Unique identifier of each floor. Useful in the context of a building or campus.

name.description: Conventional name of the floor. Should be easily identifiable to users

dwgFile.description: Path to .dwg file containg architectural floor plan and distribution.

svgFile.description: Path to .svf file containing architectural floor plan and distribution.

boundingBox.description: Coordinates for svg bounding box. Used when rendering maps

spaces.description: Array of spaces inside this floor

id.description: Unique identifier of each space inside the floor

name.description: Conventional name of the space inside the floor

category.description: Category of space (eg, conference room, cubicle, personal office). Categories vary according to client's criteria

vertices.description: Array of vertices defining the points inside the floor
